# R Programming Skills


The objectives of this workshop:

1. .large[Write 'better' R scripts: more stable, more transparent, more reproducible]

2. .large[Organize files: what inputs were used to produce which outputs?]

3. .large[Use version control (*git*) to keep track of all your changes, undo mistakes, collaborate, avoid clutter.]
